verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My glorious Victor - Prince Divine Clasp these surrender'd hands in Thine At length my will is all Thine own Glad vassal of a Savior's throne{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Master lead me to Thy door Pierce this now willing ear once more Thy bonds are freedom let me stay With Thee to toil endure obey{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes ear and hand and thought and will Use all in Thy dear slav'ry still Self's weary liberties I cast Beneath Thy feet there keep them fast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tread them still down and then I know These hands shall with Thy gifts o'erflow And pierced ears shall hear the tone Which tells me Thou and I are one{/lang-eng}
